hasAttributes.name: DurationId
hasAttributes.description: Unique Id that describes a period of time in various units from seconds to years

hasAttributes.name: description
hasAttributes.description: A narrative description of this duration to be included IN ADDITION to the specific duration using the other attributes of this entity.

hasAttributes.name: years
hasAttributes.description: the number of complete years in this duration. When calculating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, before any other duration attributes

hasAttributes.name: months
hasAttributes.description: the number of  complete months in this duration. When calcylating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, then the number of months, before any other duration attributes.

hasAttributes.name: weeks
hasAttributes.description: The number of complete weeks in this duration. When calculating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, then the months, then the weeks, before any other duration attributes.

hasAttributes.name: days
hasAttributes.description: The number of complete days in this duration. When calculating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, then the months, then weeks, then days, then hours, before any other duration attributes.

hasAttributes.name: hours
hasAttributes.description: The number of complete hours in this duration. When calculating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, then the months, then weeks, then days, then hours, before any other duration attributes.

hasAttributes.name: Minutes
hasAttributes.description: The number of complete minutes in this duration. When calculating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, then the months, then weeks, then days, then hours, then minutes, before any other duration attributes

hasAttributes.name: Seconds
hasAttributes.description: The number of complete seconds in this duration. When calculating an end date by adding this duration to a start date, the number of years are added first, then the months, then weeks, then days, then hours, then minutes and finally seconds.

definitions.description: Unique Id that describes a period of time in various units from seconds to years.
